title: omw green line on map, how do you use
body: im trying to find out how to use this omw green line thing on the map, team mates are doing it. how do i do or only friends see it or what? or teammates what ever.

replies.body:
This is part of the *smart pings* system, and you can ping the "OMW" signal by pressing CTRL, ALT, V, or G then holding down the left click button and dragging your mouse to the right side of the popup menu. 

Our [Smart Ping article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752974-Smart-Ping) goes over the complete system, if you'd like to take a look. Let me know if you have any other questions.
